abstract.shortdesc: This is a standalone plug-in without dependencies which can be installed from the command line.
abstract.p: The splash screen plug-in relies on the use of ANT to obtain and display the splash screen image. ANT 1.9+ is recommended. Older versions of the get task may fail or timeout when requesting HTTPS images.

body.p: The dita command line tool requires no additional configuration.

To switch to displaying XKCD images, amend the pom.xml within the plug-in directly and replace the line feature extension="depend.preprocess.pre" value="cats.splash"/ with feature extension="depend.preprocess.pre" value="xkcd.splash"/.
